typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		RottenTomato as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Movies
Movies aggregate(each(match(true()), $$+'_NotNull' = countIf(!isNull($$)), $$ + '_Null' = countIf(isNull($$))),
		each(match(type == 'double'  || type == 'integer' || type == 'short' || type == 'decimal'), $$+'_stddev' = round(stddev($$),2), $$ + '_min' = min ($$), $$ + '_max' = max($$), $$ + '_average' = round(avg($$),2), $$ + '_variance' = round(variance($$),2)),
		each(match(type=='string'), $$+'_maxLength' = max(length($$)))) ~> SummaryStats
SummaryStats sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['moviestats.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sinkSummaryStats
